attributes.action: Allow gyms to remain open through any lock down due to a spike in Covid 19 cases
attributes.additional_details: Fitness & leisure sector reports COVID rate of 0.34 per 100,000 visits since reopening in England. Mental Health rates are at an all time high. It is essential for us to stay healthy, physically & mentally. The government should consider gyms to be essential & low risk & keep them open.
attributes.background: Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any form of lock down due to COVID and classify them as essential.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
